channel.title: Kryptic #317 pi , Near-reality fail version
channel.description:
I have done not much work to it, but im a beginner and was a huge fan of Nr. Credits of where i got this from.. [ftp][/ftp]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=481264.0 So pretty much all i did was add a few customs, made a Nr based donarzone, changed prices, and added stats to all the whips.And made alot of droprates. sorry dont have much pictures was in a rush..
Claw specing. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/i7LZ4yV.jpg[/img]
Donarzone in work. (not finished, need to add bosses.) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yxdkZMa.jpg[/img]
Won a 27 lime stake against myself :) [URL=http://imgur.com/U5w9kH9][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U5w9kH9.jpg[/img][/URL]
Again with the stake. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qcUoEyN.jpg[/img]
I will try to keep updated and in a month maybe release my creation, well sorta my creation.(addon) Keep in mind im new at coding. So no flame.. Thanks

item.title: Kryptic #317 pi , Near-reality fail version
item.dc:creator: @scar3d scar3d
item.description:
@scar3d wrote:

furyking50:

Hmm…good luck at development, I like customs so i would play

Thanks, in the future(2 weeks maybe) when im finished coding, i would need a player to test out the beta or something , someone to have online , so add me on skype? Message me , also feel free to put in a suggestion

Read full topic

item.description:

Jayden.:

In my opinion, I absolutely hate custom items with no reasonable amount of thought put into them. So this looks horrible to me.
